title: Guard
content:
Guard is a type of profession which specializes in combat in the first region of Hopeport. It focuses on unlocking higher strength monsters to fight and allows the player to wield higher level weapons and armor. Players will be unable to attack monsters with a higher Guard level, and likewise will be unable to equip weapons and armor with a higher Guard level.



Capes are unlocked by achieving various milestones in leveling of a profession and can be purchased from Daguer at The Cloakroom located in Hopeport.
